TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit GridViewCancelEditEventArgs extends System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制引發事件時 [取消] 按鈕 (按鈕，以使用其`CommandName`屬性設定為"Cancel") 按一下時，但結束前，編輯模式。The control raises the event when the Cancel button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Cancel") is clicked, but before exiting edit mode. 這可讓您提供執行自訂的常式，例如停止取消作業，會讓資料列處於不良狀態，此事件發生時的事件處理方法。This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as stopping the cancel operation if it would put the row in an undesired state, whenever this event occurs. A物件傳遞給事件處理方法，後者則可讓您決定包含引發事件的 [取消] 按鈕的資料列的索引，並指出應該取消作業。A object is passed to the event-handling method, which allows you to determine the index of the row containing the Cancel button that raised the event and to indicate that the cancel operation should be stopped. 若要停止取消作業，請設定屬性`true`。To stop the cancel operation, set the property to `true`. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). 如需執行個體的初始屬性值的清單，請參閱建構函式。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructor. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用物件傳遞至事件處理方法，以決定包含當使用者按下 [取消] 按鈕的資料列的索引。The following example demonstrates how to use the object passed to the event-handling method to determine the index of the row containing the Cancel button clicked by the user. [!code-aspx-csharp[GridViewRowCancellingEdit#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewRowCancellingEdit/CS/gridviewrowcancellingeditcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[GridViewRowCancellingEdit#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewRowCancellingEdit/VB/gridviewrowcancellingeditvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(int32 rowIndex) cil managed

param.name: rowIndex
param.span: 包含引發事件之 [取消] 按鈕的資料列索引。

span.span: The index of the row containing the Cancel button that raised the event.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個建構函式初始化的新執行個體類別。Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the class. 下表顯示的執行個體的初始屬性值。The following table shows the initial property value for an instance of . |屬性Property|Initial valueInitial value| |--------------|-------------------| ||`rowIndex` 參數的值。The value of the `rowIndex` parameter.| > [!NOTE] > 引發事件時主要由控制項開發人員使用這個建構函式。This constructor is used primarily by control developers when raising events.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property RowIndex As Integer
public: property int RowIndex { int get(); };

summary.span: 取得包含引發事件之 [取消] 按鈕的資料列索引。

span.span: Gets the index of the row containing the Cancel button that raised the event.

value.span: 包含引發事件之 [取消] 按鈕的資料列以零起始的索引。

span.span: The zero-based index of the row containing the Cancel button that raised the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用使用者所按的屬性來判斷包含 [取消] 按鈕的資料列的索引。Use the property to determine the index of the row that contains the Cancel button clicked by the user. 資料列索引通常用來擷取此資料列從集合控制項，可讓您存取資料列的屬性。The row index is often used to retrieve this row from the collection of the control, which allows you to access the row's properties. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用使用者所按的屬性來判斷包含 [取消] 按鈕的資料列的索引。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to determine the index of the row containing the Cancel button clicked by the user. [!code-aspx-csharp[GridViewRowCancellingEdit#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewRowCancellingEdit/CS/gridviewrowcancellingeditcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[GridViewRowCancellingEdit#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewRowCancellingEdit/VB/gridviewrowcancellingeditvb.aspx#1)]
